pkgmetadata.longdescription: IEEG (Intracranial Electroencephalography) Epoch Data Tools // Provides tools for working with iEEG matrix data, including downloading curated iEEG data from OSF (The Open Science Framework https://osf.io/) (EpochDownloader()), making new objects (Epoch()), processing (crop() and resample()), and visualizing the data (plot()).
